info.name: YeOldReader
info.description:
A Choose your own color theme for The Old Reader.
Version 2.0 - Fork No More!
Choose your own highlight color, button color, blockquote style and more :)
info.additionalInfo:
Change Log

View changelog at https://github.com/Hippyjake/HippyjakesUserStyles/commits/master

Version 2.0.1 - Fork No More! Is here!

Allows the customization of:

  • Color Options for
    • Highlight Color
    • Background Color
    • Button Background Color (I like to use a couple shades darker than the highlight color)
    • Body Text Color
    • Badge and Label Text Color
  • Two blockquote styles
    • Stock Like TheOldReaderâ€™s normal style
    • Fancy Uses Large quotation marks that match the chossen hightlight color
  • Social links on left side menu are optional, but on by default
  • Dropdown on hover Top Bar, not enabled by default

I have borrowed some text style from The Old Reader Dark for read and unread text color

The optional social link option was provided by The Old Reader - Hide Sidebar Social Links

The hover bar option was provided by The Old Reader - Compact and Hover Menu

options.label: Stock Style blockquote
Fancy Style blockquote

settings.label: Remove Social Links on Left Menu
